title: Urban typography St. Petersburg
content:
I came back from the ATypI 08 conference in St. Petersburg, and uploaded some images on my Flickr page [http://www.flickr.com/photos/fontef/collections/72157607442922370/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034511/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/fontef/collections/72157607442922370/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2881380461_66e56b18e1_5722.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2881381767_003c998800_4273.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2882214662_3031e68985_5913.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2882215022_7b2ae7fdbb_4137.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2882215716_b7a33e382d_6377.jpg)
author: yanek

comments.content: Each one absolutely beautiful. I love the colors of the third one so much, I think I’m just gonna have to sample them for my next design. What is it about erosion that is so aesthetically pleasing to me? Thanks for sharing!

i added a few to my [kirillitsa](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205034511/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/pauldhunt/sets/72157600292550299/) set, there are and a few more snaps of the city if you browse around...
